data.Title: Reddit, Pinterest, and Snapchat Court Marketers Amidst Brand Safety Concerns
data.Description: This is the second half of Digiday’s CMO Strategies report on social media. In this report, we examine Pinterest, Reddit and Snapchat's efforts to attract marketers and how brand safety remains a concern across social media platforms.

data.Title: TikTok and Snap Offer Influencer Agencies Access to Data and Creators to Compete with Meta
data.Description: Social platforms from TikTok to Snap are developing closer relationships with influencer agencies by offering direct access to first-party data and creator programs as Meta apps maintain their dominance.

data.Description: Publicis Groupe, followed closely by Omnicom, posted strong six-month performances — and more importantly, expect solid mid-single digit organic growth in the second half of 2024.

data.Title: Brands Prioritize Paralympic Games in Marketing Efforts
data.Description: Three advertisers discuss how and why they’re making the Paralympics a priority.

data.Title: Ahrefs to Introduce "Patches" Feature for Easier SEO Audit Implementation
data.Description: Ahrefs is developing a new "Patches" feature for their Site Audit tool. This feature aims to simplify the implementation of SEO audit recommendations, allowing users to fix various website issues more easily.

data.Title: Microsoft Bing Poised to Gain Market Share as Google Faces Antitrust Issues
data.Description: Microsoft (Nasdaq: MSFT) Has a $40 Billion Honey Pot Teed up: Bing could gain market share as Google faces antitrust issues, making Microsoft a potential long-term buy. If Google is forced to break up or stop paying for default search status, Bing could benefit, especially with a deal with Apple. Microsoft could see a revenue boost, while Google (Alphabet) might become a long-term sell. […]

data.Title: Google Search Experiences Volatility Ahead of Next Core Update
data.Description: Google Search Ranking Algorithm Volatility August 9th and 10th: Since Friday, August 9th, I have been seeing yet another intense spike in Google Search ranking volatility. This is based on the SEO chatter within the communities and of course, the third-party Google Search rank volatility trackers.  And no, we still do not have a new core update officially released by Google but it is coming soon, weeks away...

data.Title: Content-First Approach to SEO Recommended for Dropshipping Businesses
data.Description: Best SEO for Dropshipping: For merchants selling dropshipped goods, a "content-then-commerce" approach could improve organic search rankings.

data.Title: Consensus AI Search Engine Challenges ChatGPT and Gemini by Focusing on Scientific Research
data.Description: Google who? This new service actually gets AI search right: By scouring published scientific research, Consensus makes ChatGPT and Gemini look like ill-informed rubes by comparison.

data.Title: Amazon Sellers Prepare Inventory for Extended Holiday Season
data.Description: Black Friday is more than three months away, but Amazon’s third-party sellers are already scrambling to plan ahead.

data.Title: Marketers Adapt to Shifting Holiday and Seasonal Promotion Cycles
data.Description: Marketing Briefing: Why marketers aren't confined to traditional holiday and seasonal promotion cycles anymore: The timeline for holidays and traditional promotional cycles like say Black Friday and Cyber Monday that made up seasonal marketing efforts have changed and stretched out in recent years.

data.Title: Instagram Surpasses Facebook in Brand Perception, According to Digiday+ Research
data.Description: Digiday+ Research: Instagram is head and shoulders above Facebook in the eyes of brands: While brands' Facebook usage and spend remain strong, the platform is being eclipsed by Meta sibling Instagram.

data.Title: Baked by Melissa CEO Emphasizes Authenticity Over Strategy in Social Media
data.Description: 'We don't have a social media strategy': How Baked by Melissa's CEO and co-founder Melissa Ben-Ishay went from founder to influencer: With so many changes happening across the digital marketing landscape, sometimes the best strategy is to have no strategy at all — at least when it comes to social media, according Melissa Ben-Ishay, co-founder and CEO of dessert company Baked By Melissa.

data.Title: AI-Agnostic Optimization: Leveraging AI for Content Creation and Brand Authority
data.Description: AI Agnostic Optimization: Content For Topical Authority And Citations: Learn how AI is shaping content creation and brand authority. Stay competitive with AI citations and gain an edge in consumer interactions.

data.Title: Bing Outperformed Google in Mobile Query Speed in 2017, According to Google Document
data.Description: Bing Was Faster Than Google In 2017: A Google document that came out of the DOJ trails said that back in 2017, Bing Search was faster than Google was specifically looking at mobile queries.  The document was an internal Google document and went through 10 elements of latency.
